metadata.synopsis: Vignette: In the Dead of Night one-liner

0.speaker: Battrick Degronce
0.text: Don't bother reporting it. The Fists don't care what happens down here.
0.context: NodeContext: Bitter, used to Flaming Fists ignoring them

1.speaker: Battrick Degronce
1.text: You can smell that, right? Bloody rotten, it is.
1.context: NodeContext: rehetorical question, looking for back up that the smell exists and is worth worrying about
